description.message: Require `.webmanifest` as the file extension for the web app manifest file

shouldHaveFileExtension.description: Report message when the file extension doesn't exists
shouldHaveFileExtension.message: Web app manifest should have the filename extension '$1'.

shouldHaveFileExtensionNot.description: Report message when the file extension is incorrect.
shouldHaveFileExtensionNot.message: Web app manifest should have the filename extension '$1', not '$2'.
